item.title: Trump threatens to slap even higher tariffs on Canada
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday said he will hike the new 25% tariffs on Canadian goods if the country retaliates with its own levies.

item.title: Time to kill? Daylight saving falls out of favor with most Americans
item.description: Most Americans say it is time to pull the plug on daylight saving time.
